body_html:
@peterjc123 so how to get pytorch installed in the second environment ? and let it read from there
After changing to python 3.5, and reinstalled torch. I got this error

Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "<stdin>", line 1, in <module>
  File "C:\Python35\lib\site-packages\torch\__init__.py", line 78, in <module>
    from torch._C import *
ImportError: DLL load failed: The specified module could not be found.

and these are my environments

C:\Python35\
C:\Python35\Scripts

and I added this too to the environment variables, but still the same error
C:\Python35\Lib\site-packages\torch

body:
@peterjc123 so how to get pytorch installed in the second environment ? and let it read from there
After changing to python 3.5, and reinstalled torch. I got this error

```
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "<stdin>", line 1, in <module>
  File "C:\Python35\lib\site-packages\torch\__init__.py", line 78, in <module>
    from torch._C import *
ImportError: DLL load failed: The specified module could not be found.
```
and these are my environments
```
C:\Python35\
C:\Python35\Scripts
```
and I added this too to the environment variables, but still the same error
`C:\Python35\Lib\site-packages\torch`
